item.title: Project 3: Music Genre Classification based on Lyrics (Multiclass Classification)
item.description: In this project I built a model do classify the genre of a music, based on its lyric. The model was trained with some popular brazilian music styles, such as Ax√©, Funk, MPB, Pagode, Samba and Sertanejo. I collected music lyrics in LETRAS.MUS.BR web site, I developed web scrappers, one for each music genre, using Python package BeaultifulSoup. Almost 1k lyrics was collected for each genre. The web crawlers codes are available here.
